spec_data.Name: perl-Algorithm-Dependency
spec_data.Description:
Algorithm::Dependency is a framework for creating simple read-only
dependency hierarchies, where you have a set of items that rely on other
items in the set, and require actions on them as well.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:50:38 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Algorithmic framework for implementing dependency trees
